StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHL GWAS: Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) Cases

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS) of Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL) project was supported by the intramural program of the Division of Cancer Epidemiology and Genetics (DCEG), National Cancer Institute (NCI), National Institutes of Health (NIH). The datasets have been accessed through the NIH database for Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under accession # phs000801. A full list of acknowledgements can be found in the supplementary note (Berndt SI et al., Nature Genet., 2013, PMID: 23770605).
If the following dataset(s) were used, please cite the following publication(s) in all oral or written presentations, disclosures, or publications: (1) Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) Cases - Berndt SI et al., Nature Genet., 2013, PMID: 23770605; (2) Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL) Cases - Cerhan JR, et al., Nature Genet., 2014, PMID: 25261932; (3) Follicular Lymphoma (FL) Cases - Skibola CF, et al., Am J Human Genetics, 2014, PMID: 25279986; (4) Marginal Zone Lymphoma (MZL) Cases - Vijai J et al., Nat Commun, 2015, PMID: 25569183; (5) Control set - Berndt SI et al., Nature Genetics, 2013, PMID: 23770605.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (non-Hodgkin Lymphoma, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-NHL-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to non-Hodgkin Lymphoma. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, IRB, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-IRB-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
